overview: One Stop For Love is a ZEE5 exclusive sex comedy film starring Shweta Khandhuri, Mausam Sharma, Shikha Singh and Richa Sinha. Instigated by her friend’s rude comments, Sanjana, a drunk virgin girl, ends up booking a gigolo online. Desperate to lose her virginity, she meets a couple of guys until she finds her perfect match.
title: One Stop For Love
